summary: This is an FBI FD-302 form documenting a proffer interview conducted with an individual named PEREZ at the Southern District of New York on August 21, 2019. The interview was attended by two Assistant U.S. Attorneys and two law enforcement officers, and the information relates to an investigation.

connections.description: PEREZ was interviewed by AUSAs as part of a proffer agreement, indicating a formal legal/prosecutorial interaction.
FBI Special Agent was one of the interviewing investigators of PEREZ during the proffer session.
FBI Task Force Officer Detective was present as an interviewing investigator during PEREZ's proffer session.
Both were law enforcement officers present as interviewing investigators at the same proffer interview.
Both were part of the investigative/prosecutorial team conducting the proffer interview with PEREZ.

keyFacts: An individual named PEREZ participated in a proffer interview with prosecutors and FBI agents on August 21, 2019.
The interview was conducted under a formal Proffer Agreement, indicating cooperation with an investigation.
The FD-302 form was drafted on December 20, 2019, documenting the earlier interview.
The document is part of FBI case file 90A-NY-3151227.
The document contains a standard FBI disclaimer that it is the property of the FBI and not for distribution outside the receiving agency.
